articles.content:
Greetings to President of Hungary 
   Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Laszlo Solyom, president of Hungary, on the occasion of its national day.
 The message wished the Hungarian people prosperity and well-being, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Hungary would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too.
